alert.note: Alert for Logan; Montgomery; Polk; Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 11:02PM CDT until May 02 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Logan County in western Arkansas... Scott County in western Arkansas... Northern Polk County in western Arkansas... Southwestern Yell County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1102 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cameron to Hartford to 6 miles northwest of Mountain Fork, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Paris... Mansfield... Magazine... Subiaco... Oden... Ratcliff... Blue Mountain... Beauchamp... Cardiff... Muddy Creek WMA... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Gravelly... Mount Magazine... Echo... Oliver... Morgan Springs... Queen Wilhelmina State Park... Caulksville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for western and central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for western and central Arkansas.
